overview: All aboard for a tour of some of America's greatest O-gauge model railroads. Builders take you inside the magic of these miniature landscapes, sharing tips on their construction and the amazing details in their design. Highlights include award-winning Disney animator Ward Kimball, model legend Stan Roy and Ron Zweig showing off their Lionel and American Flyer layouts, and a special look at the huge EnterTRAINment exhibit from the Mall of America.
title: Great Toy Train Layouts
